casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donnie Dean SHOLAR. No. 337P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Amicus Curiae":

*558"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
